ValidationRule.description: Created this to prevent case status to be changed if closed date is 30 or more than 30 for #SE-146 Update to to SE-2458
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
OR( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),"Closed"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),"Canceled") ),
OR( (ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(HRCSVC_Awaiting_Customer_Response_Date__c))), NOT(ISBLANK(HRCSVC_Awaiting_Customer_Response_Date__c)) ),
NOT($Setup.HRCFSL_Org_Exception_Rule__c.HRCFSL_Validation_Rule__c), RecordType.Name <> 'Scaletronix Service', RecordType.Name <> 'WA Technical Support' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot update a canceled or closed Case
